name: Use Demo Server Example!
info:
Import Demo Server example with
strg+i -> Example -> opcuaIIoT -> Server -> Demo Server

name: Use Demo Server
info:
This example only works with the server example "Demo Server".
Import that with strg+i -> examples -> opcuaIIoT -> server -> Demo Server

name: information
info:
Clients to browse

UA-Expert: https://www.unified-automation.com/products/development-tools/uaexpert.html
OPCUA-Commander: https://github.com/node-opcua/opcua-commander
Node-RED: use the browse examples to start browsing the server via Node-RED

Happy wiring!
Klaus Landsdorf
http://bianco-royal.de/

name: Dashboard Style
format:
<style>
    ui-card-panel {
        box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0px 5px 15px;
        border-radius: 15px;
        padding-bottom: 25px;

    ui-ui-card-panel * {
